price: 当我以我的命令启示穆萨的时候，你没有在西山边，也没有亲眼看见。
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلۡغَرۡبِيِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta bijānibi al-gharbiyi idh qaḍaynā ilā mūsā al-amra wamā kunta mina al-shāhidīna
